entity.name: Latest updates from local US authorities regarding the coronavirus

text:
We're increasing #COVID19 testing.

The number of tests reported today increased by almost 29,000.

The percentage of people who are testing positive remains low: below 5%.

And, hospitalizations decreased.

All good signs in our fight against #coronavirus. 

#txlege
